captions.text:
Everybody stand up,
we'll use the red box

where you put the scenes
that you created.

The actors will have to improvise the
first thing that comes to their minds,

beginning with...
"What you shouldn't say to a superhero".

Oh, so you're the...
Wooonder Woman...
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!

Do you want the picture
with or without flash?

How will we pay
for this drink, my lad?

Will you take me...
You horse?
"Things you shouldn't do in the rain"

The rain is falling down...
Fuck!

Are you sure this is how
a Perfect Storm Cocktail is made?
I'd like to know the world's worst cook!

Let's se now some weird ways
to overcome boredom.
Andy, would you cook for me?

You don't have to abduct me!
I already have a probe!
Let's find a specimen for reproduction...

A tip for the folks at home:
"Gifts you shouldn't give on Christmas".

"Gifts you shouldn't give on Christmas",
the Barbixas will show you.
Do you want an Easter egg?
